quotes.quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
Always continue the climb. It is possible for you to do whatever you choose, if you first get to know who you are and are willing to work with a power that is greater than ourselves to do it.
One of the most important keys to success is having the discipline to do what you know you should do, even when you dont feel like doing it.
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed it strong enough.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Don't focus on what's wrong. Things may not be perfect, but be grateful for the opportunity to experience each day. Live each day like it could be your last.
Don't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the further you get.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.

The past is a place of reference, not a place of residence; the past is a place of learning, not a place of living.The past is a place of reference, not a place of residence; the past is a place of learning, not a place of living.
I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people.
When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Don't waste your energy trying to convince people to understand you. Your time is too valuable to try to prove yourself to people.

If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe remember you can achieve
Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind.
You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
Don't be afraid to stand for what you believe in, even if that means standing alone.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched they must be felt with the heart.
Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.
Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you can never see the shadow.
